Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Dish
Description: Dish with a flat base and a flared wall ending in a thinned lip. The coarse buff-coloured and polished clay has large quantities of organic temper and tends to flake. The rim is adorned with a white band, which has almost entirely disappeared. A few drops paint have fallen on to the inside.
